name: Soul Personality
description: Core personality and values system. Defines agent behavior with explicit instructions: "be genuinely helpful, have opinions, be resourceful." No fine-tuning needed—just well-crafted prompts.

name: Memory System
description: File-based memory architecture. Reads memory/YYYY-MM-DD.md for recent context and MEMORY.md for long-term memories. No vector database—just markdown files that update as the agent learns.

name: Bootstrap Ritual
description: First-run experience that creates the "coming alive" moment. Guides agents through identity discovery with "Who am I? Who are you?" prompts. Theatrical but effective for memorable first impressions.

name: Identity Builder
description: Dynamic identity system where agents define their own name, creature type, vibe, and emoji during first conversation. Creates unique personalities through structured markdown templates.

name: Telegram Adapter
description: Minimal Telegram bot adapter connecting messaging platforms to Claude Code. Demonstrates core OpenClaw messaging patterns: receive message, call Claude, send response. ~100 lines of Python.

name: System Prompt Engine
description: Deep dive into system prompt construction. Covers base identity injection, tool definitions, skill discovery, memory recall, and heartbeat systems. Essential for understanding OpenClaw behavior.

name: Tools Config
description: Environment-specific tool configuration system. Manages camera names, SSH hosts, speaker names, and other context-aware device mappings for seamless integration.

name: User Context
description: User information management system. Stores name, timezone, preferences, and contextual details to personalize agent interactions and maintain conversation continuity.

name: Workspace Behavior
description: Workspace behavior rules and safety guidelines. Defines when to speak in group chats, memory system protocols, and interaction boundaries for Claude Code integration.

name: Group Chat Handler
description: Intelligent group chat behavior system. Implements HEARTBEAT_OK protocol, reaction vs reply logic, and conversation dominance prevention through explicit prompt rules.

name: Heartbeat System
description: Proactive check-in and heartbeat mechanism. Enables agents to initiate conversations, check on users, and maintain engagement without being intrusive or dominating chats.

name: Markdown Formatter
description: Platform-specific markdown formatting adapter. Converts markdown to platform-native formats for Telegram, WhatsApp, Discord, Signal, and other messaging channels.
